title: A rustc panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
```
     Running `rustc --crate-name zvariant --edition=2018 zvariant/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 --cfg 'feature="default"' --cfg 'feature="enumflags2"' --cfg 'feature="gvariant"' -C metadata=28a35b025aa7596b -C extra-filename=-28a35b025aa7596b --out-dir /home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps --extern byteorder=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps/libbyteorder-a6db7e07f13316c2.rmeta --extern enumflags2=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps/libenumflags2-f9e9f7ecfba82bb2.rmeta --extern serde=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps/libserde-5b03fa9c708802b8.rmeta --extern zvariant_derive=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps/libzvariant_derive-1dd2fd47904d1814.so`
       Fresh gobject-sys v0.10.0 (https://github.com/gtk-rs/sys#5f35e26c)
       Fresh glib v0.10.0 (https://github.com/gtk-rs/glib?rev=c9ee583cea0#c9ee583c)
warning: unused variable: `s`
    --> zvariant/src/lib.rs:1613:13
     |
1613 |         let s = SomeStuct {
     |             ^ help: if this is intentional, prefix it with an underscore: `_s`
     |
     = note: `#[warn(unused_variables)]` on by default

warning: 1 warning emitted

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 174568 but the index is 943372', /rustc/cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/dep_graph/graph.rs:1546:15

   0: rust_begin_unwind
             at /rustc/cb75ad5db02783e8b0222fee363c5f63f7e2cf5b/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5

   7: rustc_plugin_impl::build::find_plugin_registrar

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md

note: rustc 1.50.0 (cb75ad5db 2021-02-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

#0 [plugin_registrar_fn] looking up the plugin registrar for a crate
#1 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate
end of query stack

error: could not compile `zvariant`

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name zvariant --edition=2018 zvariant/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 --cfg 'feature="default"' --cfg 'feature="enumflags2"' --cfg 'feature="gvariant"' -C metadata=28a35b025aa7596b -C extra-filename=-28a35b025aa7596b --out-dir /home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps --extern byteorder=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps/libbyteorder-a6db7e07f13316c2.rmeta --extern enumflags2=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps/libenumflags2-f9e9f7ecfba82bb2.rmeta --extern serde=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps/libserde-5b03fa9c708802b8.rmeta --extern zvariant_derive=/home/zeenix/checkout/dbus/zbus/target/debug/deps/libzvariant_derive-1dd2fd47904d1814.so` (exit code: 101)
```
